item.title: Swiggy Lunchbox
item.description: Creating a seamless delivery scheduling system for working professionals # Project type: Personal Project Duration: 3 weeks Brief # A large percentage of Swiggy’s most active users are office goers who live alone and order lunch daily from Swiggy. In a recent customer survey of this audience set, Swiggy found that these users often forget to order lunch in time and find it cumbersome and irritating to go through the entire process of ordering food on a daily basis.
